name: sunflower production | sunflower seed | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/15824/documentation

This dataset represents the production of 1 kg of sunflower grains, at standard water content required for storage (8%). The average yield from 2009 - 2012 is 2.2 t/ha. The data are representative for sunflower production in Hungary based on average data over the country. Mineral NPK fertiliser input is 57-50-21 kg/ha. No organic fertilisers are applied. Total active ingredients (a.i.) applied as pesticides amount to 4.5 kg a.i./ha.;The dataset was modelled within the project 'World Food LCA database (WFLDB)'. The aim of this project was to provide inventories of a broad variety of agricultural products and processes and to cover for each product at least 50% of the global export market. The export share of sunflower produced in Hungary amounts to 18% of the global export (tonnage exported in 2010). The production system regarded in this dataset aimed at representing sunflower produced in Hungary for the export market.;PEF-Quality: data quality rating (DQR) = 3.2 (i.e. fair quality). This dataset refers to an average situation; for specific situations exchanges might differ substantially due to site specific parameters

This activity starts with soil cultivation after the harvest of the previous crop.

This activity ends with the harvest of sunflowers and their transport to the farm gate. The dataset includes all machine operations, corresponding infrastructure, fuel use and sheds. Machine operations are: soil cultivation, sowing, pesticide and fertilizer application, harvesting, and on-farm transport. Further, direct field emissions and land use change are included. Heavy metal uptake by the crop is considered. The inputs of seeds, fertilisers and pesticides as well as packaging of fertilisers and pesticides are considered. The dataset doesn't include drying due to lack of data.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/011:Growing of non-perennial crops/0111:Growing of cereals (except rice), leguminous crops and oil seeds

processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: If used, extrapolations are documented on the flow level.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: WFLDB Methodological Guidelines for the Life Cycle Inventory of Agricultural Products in the latest version, available at: (Report section: https://v30.ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/File/Reports). Data sources: Data were categorised from level 0 (L0) to level (L4) as follows: L0 = estimate, proxy; L1 = statistical data (e.g. FAOSTAT); L2 = L1 adapted to crop and country; L3 = literature data or L1 resp. L2 data approved by experts; medium detailing (i.e. kg of total N-fertiliser); L4 = L3 data of high detailing (i.e. portion N-fertiliser types).In this dataset data were obtained for yield: L1; Fertilisers: L3; Pesticides: L1; Machinery: L1/L2; Irrigation: L2. For information regarding the calculation of individual exchanges see supporting documentation WFLDB-Documentation.pdf.

exchanges.description: Reference flow: Yield = 2198.5 kg/ha

flow.name: Fenpropimorph
flow.category: Elementary flows/Emission to soil/agricultural

exchanges.description:
The exchange has been updated from 'inorganic nitrogen fertiliser, as N' into 'urea ammonium nitrate' and therefore its amount has been scaled (multiplied) from 0.0014 kg by 3.3333 kg of 'urea ammonium nitrate' per kg of 'inorganic nitrogen fertiliser, as N'. Original comment of the exchange is: Calculated based on literature values or expert estimation: The total amount of nutrient (Marinussen et al. 2012) multiplied by the country-share of fertiliser type (IFA 2014). See supporting documentation 'WFLDB-Documentation.pdf' chapter 'Fertiliser application' for L3 and L4 data  (https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/File/Reports).
Corresponds to 1.24 kg/ha

exchanges.description: Total amount of active substance/s of pesticides needed for the production of sunflower seed is calculated to be circa 2.05E-03 kg. Pesticide/s used in this dataset is/are: '[sulfonyl]urea-compound', '[thio]carbamate-compound', 'acetamide-anillide-compound, unspecified', 'aclonifen', 'cyclic N-compound', 'diazole-compound', 'glyphosate', 'metaldehyde', 'metolachlor', 'pendimethalin', 'phenoxy-compound', 'pyrethroid-compound'. The total amount of active substance/s is doubled in order to account for the packaging of the dilluted product of pesticide/s that is/are applied. Therefore, 4.10E-03 kg of packaging for pesticides is justified with this exchange.

exchanges.description:
The exchange has been updated from 'calcium ammonium nitrate' into 'calcium ammonium nitrate' and therefore its amount has been scaled (multiplied) from 0.0096 kg by 3.7037 kg of 'calcium ammonium nitrate' per kg of 'calcium ammonium nitrate'. Original comment of the exchange is: Calculated based on literature values or expert estimation: The total amount of nutrient (Marinussen et al. 2012) multiplied by the country-share of fertiliser type (IFA 2014). See supporting documentation 'WFLDB-Documentation.pdf' chapter 'Fertiliser application' for L3 and L4 data  (https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/File/Reports).
Corresponds to 1.24 kg/ha
